TopicTitle: How do I undo an edit?

Articles.Content:
Hi, I royally messed up the formatting for my post when I was editing it

and I need help in trying to undo it.
Is there any way for me to undo an edit?
I believe you'll just need to edit it again.

Now I'm facing another problem, the post seems to have a height limit and cuts off at a certain point making the content below that point unreachable.

Do I just rewrite the post at this point?

Looks like you fixed it, but to answer your question yes, I'd delete EVERYTHING and start over. Maybe copy/paste into Notepad so you still have all the text, but paste it back in and re-add all the formatting.

The WYSIWYG editor works fine MOST of the time, but if it gets screwed up you simply do NOT have the tools to fix it.

As an author of quite an extensive post - once it's screwed up, it's screwed up. Attempting to make it work again with current editor is such a pain in the butt that it's really easier to just start from scratch.
